Name: Base Station License, Approval, New York Flag Car & Limousine Service, Manhattan
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by New York Flag Car & Limousine Service, Inc. for a license to operate a new base station in the borough of Manhattan.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by New York Flag Car & Limousine Service, Inc. for a license to operate a new base station at 527 West 36th Street in the borough of Manhattan is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2.  This local law shall take effect immediately. 


LS#2609
